name: RunAway (gamestergame)
description:
Run away! Run away! Run away! 
If you don't run away, the сute succubus will find you!
RunAway is a horror game where your goal is to run away from the enemy and collect notes on a procedurally generated level or in a story mode consisting of 5 pre-made levels.
The game may freeze during loading at 100% - this is normal, just wait a bit.
